title: This foldable Anker charger looks like a UFO and keeps everything juiced up
description: Macworld Charging all your devices at once can be a nightmare to manage due to all the cables you need and all the wall plugs. Well, not with this cute Anker portable wireless charging station that can easily handle all your Apple gear. And wouldn’t you know it, but the Anker UFO 3-in-1 charger is $72 at Amazon right now, 20% under its $90 MSRP. This Anker charger will look great on your desk, clearing out the madness that is usually required to charge your gear. This 3-in-1 charger is super versatile, allowing you to charge your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods in one go. The UFO charger features three magnetic plates specifically made for your devices. The iPhone goes to the left, your AirPods go in the middle, and the Apple Watch on the right—all neatly in line. The whole thing only needs one wire and wall plug, both of which are included in your purchase. And when not in use or when you’re traveling, you can just fold them one over the other in a super compact format. So don’t waste any time and get yourself a tiny UFO for all your Apple gear for just $72 at Amazon. Snatch this 3-in-1 chargerBuy it now at Amazon

Image: Anker

Charging all your devices at once can be a nightmare to manage due to all the cables you need and all the wall plugs. Well, not with this cute Anker portable wireless charging station that can easily handle all your Apple gear. And wouldn’t you know it, but the Anker UFO 3-in-1 charger is $72 at Amazon right now, 20% under its $90 MSRP.

This Anker charger will look great on your desk, clearing out the madness that is usually required to charge your gear. This 3-in-1 charger is super versatile, allowing you to charge your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods in one go. The UFO charger features three magnetic plates specifically made for your devices. The iPhone goes to the left, your AirPods go in the middle, and the Apple Watch on the right—all neatly in line. The whole thing only needs one wire and wall plug, both of which are included in your purchase. And when not in use or when you’re traveling, you can just fold them one over the other in a super compact format.

So don’t waste any time and get yourself a tiny UFO for all your Apple gear for just $72 at Amazon.
